rooms.name: Entrance Hallway & Foyer
rooms.description: The foyer welcomes guests with a modern twist on traditional Chettinad elements. Decorative tiles and ornate fixtures echo the rich cultural heritage of Chettinad.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with natural light from large windows overlooking a private balcony. The room features elegant woodwork and traditional drapery complementing Chettinad aesthetics.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living area with an open layout that integrates dining space seamlessly. Incorporates traditional motifs in the wall art and decor.

rooms.name: Home Theatre
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment zone designed for a cinematic experience. Soundproofed walls with integrated seating arrangements, ensuring immersive viewing from all angles. Vastu principles ensure the placement optimizes energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom featuring a private balcony overlooking serene garden spaces. The design includes large windows for natural light and ventilation following Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Kitchenette
rooms.description: Compact yet fully functional kitchenette integrated with modern appliances and traditional Chettinad aesthetics. The placement adheres to the east-facing requirements as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small utility space for storage and maintenance, strategically located near the kitchenette.

openings.description: A wide entrance door designed with traditional Chettinad motifs, ensuring a welcoming entry in accordance with Vastu principles.
Spacious balcony providing natural light and an outdoor view for relaxation while maintaining privacy.
Large windows ensure ample daylight enters the living spaces, enhancing energy flow as per Vastu.
